name: Fighting Fire with Fire
description:
Seth is a scientist by trade. He was always fascinated by mythology and the thought of being able to bring those creatures to life!

Four years ago, he lost his dear wife and young daughter to a nuclear accident. Seeing the volatile  substance grow into threats of war and destruction, Seth set out on a quest to turn his curiosity and fantasies into a reality. This way he can become  the hero his daughter always saw him as, and the one he was destined to be.

But what if it all goes wrong?

Play in Seth's shoes as you try out the sixth version of this experiment, and see what results come. Just be careful. It's a brutal world out there.

(This is a small Interactive Fiction game I have created for a college project. I have only just started using Inky, and thus this may not be very good. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. If you want to contact me, Tweet me at @Liam__Gregory or email me at liamgstar99@gmail.com)
